item.title: CVE-2024-29098|2024-03-19T15:57:36.413Z -- Calameo -- WP Calameo
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Calameo WP Calameo allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP Calameo: from n/a through 2.1.7.
